biweekly.io

Class TimezoneInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • biweekly.io.TimezoneInfo

  • public class TimezoneInfo
extends Object
    Holds the timezone-related settings of an iCalendar object.
    Author:
    Michael Angstadt

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TimezoneInfo()

    • Constructor Detail

      • TimezoneInfo

        public TimezoneInfo()

    • Method Detail

      • assign

        public void assign(VTimezone component,
          TimeZone timezone)
        Assigns a user-defined VTimezone component to its Java TimeZone equivalent.
        Parameters:
        component - the timezone component
        timezone - the timezone object

      • setDefaultTimeZone

        public void setDefaultTimeZone(TimeZone timezone)
        Sets the timezone to format all date/time values in. An attempt will be made to generate a VTimezone component if one has not already been assigned to the given timezone (see assign()).
        Parameters:
        timezone - the timezone object or null for UTC (default)
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if a VTimezone component could not be generated

      • setGlobalFloatingTime

        public void setGlobalFloatingTime(boolean enable)
        Sets whether to format all date/time values as floating times. A floating time value does not have a timezone associated with it, and is to be interpreted as being in the local timezone of the parsing computer.
        Parameters:
        enable - true to enable, false to disable (default)

      • setTimeZone

        public void setTimeZone(ICalProperty property,
               TimeZone timezone)
        Instructs the writer to format an individual property's date/time value in a specific timezone.
        Parameters:
        property - the property
        timezone - the timezone or null to format the property according to the default timezone (default)

      • setTimeZone

        public void setTimeZone(ICalProperty property,
               TimeZone timezone,
               boolean generateComponent)
        Instructs the writer to format an individual property's date/time value in a specific timezone.
        Parameters:
        property - the property
        timezone - the timezone or null to format the property according to the default timezone (default)
        generateComponent - true to associate the property with a VTimezone component containing the timezone definition (recommended), false not to. If the "timezone" parameter is null, then this parameter has no effect

      • getTimeZone

        public TimeZone getTimeZone(ICalProperty property)
        Gets the timezone that is assigned to a property.
        Parameters:
        property - the property
        Returns:
        the timezone or null if no timezone is assigned to the property

      • hasSolidusTimezone

        public boolean hasSolidusTimezone(ICalProperty property)
        Determines if the given property has a solidus timezone (a globally unique timezone ID).
        Parameters:
        property - the property
        Returns:
        true if the property has a solidus timezone, false if not

      • getTimeZoneToWriteIn

        public TimeZone getTimeZoneToWriteIn(ICalProperty property)
        Gets the timezone that a property should be formatted in when written. You should call isFloating(biweekly.property.ICalProperty) first, to check to see if the property's value is floating (without a timezone).
        Parameters:
        property - the property
        Returns:
        the timezone or null for UTC

      • getTimeZoneById

        public TimeZone getTimeZoneById(String id)
        Gets a timezone with a given ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID
        Returns:
        the timezone or null if not found

      • getTimeZoneByComponent

        public TimeZone getTimeZoneByComponent(VTimezone component)
        Gets the TimeZone object that is assigned to a VTimezone component.
        Parameters:
        component - the component
        Returns:
        the timezone object or null if none were found

      • getComponent

        public VTimezone getComponent(ICalProperty property)
        Gets the VTimezone component that a property is assigned to.
        Parameters:
        property - the property
        Returns:
        the component or null if it is not assigned to one

      • setFloating

        public void setFloating(ICalProperty property,
               boolean enable)
        Instructs the writer to format a particular property's date/time value in floating time. A floating time value does not have a timezone associated with it, and is to be interpreted as being in the local timezone of the parsing computer.
        Parameters:
        property - the property whose value should be formatted as a floating time value
        enable - true to enable floating time for this property, false to disable (default)

      • isFloating

        public boolean isFloating(ICalProperty property)
        Determines if a property value should be formatted in floating time or not.
        Parameters:
        property - the property
        Returns:
        true to format in floating time, false not to

      • getComponents

        public Collection<VTimezone> getComponents()
        Gets all of the iCalendar VTimezone components that have been registered or generated by this class.
        Returns:
        the timezone components

      • getGenerator

        public VTimezoneGenerator getGenerator()
        Gets the timezone generator.
        Returns:
        the timezone generator

      • setGenerator

        public void setGenerator(VTimezoneGenerator generator)
        Sets the timezone generator.
        Parameters:
        generator - the timezone generator
